I had always heard about how amazing Half-Life 2 was and had never played it until now but I must say it is one of the best games I have ever played! It took me 20 hours to beat which is usually a very long time for me but I was just so enthralled the entire time to just play it. Not in a long time has a game had me wanting to play it for hours the moment I woke up in the morning. And then have me wanting to play it again right after to get 100%! Now I can understand why everyone wants Half-Life 3 so badly and once I beat the game a second time to get all the achievements, I'm heading off to play episode 1 and 2.

This game has rightfully earned it's place as one of the best games of all time.

Однажды прочитал статью о данной игре, спустя 7 лет решил установить и выпал из реальности примерно на 2 недели. В ней есть все составляющие шедевра: Лихо закрученный сюжет, потрясающая атмосфера, бодрый геймплей, отличное звуковое сопровождение.

Сохранив атмосферу тревоги, вызова и внутреннего напряжения cо времён первой части и добавив новый реализм и интерактивность, Half-Life 2 открывает дверь в мир, в котором присутствие игрока влияет на все, что его окружает — от физической среды до поведения и даже эмоций как друзей, так и врагов.

[b]Итог:  Даже сейчас, спустя 10 лет, мне все так же интересно играть в нее, как и в, скажем, BioShock, Far Cry, Metro! После прохождения HL2 до конца (дважды) я могу с уверенностью сказать, что игра полностью оправдывает звание «Лучшая игра для PC всех времен» от PC Gamer.[/b]

Half-Life 2 is not only a masterfully created FPS but also one of the most immersive video games one can experience. Cut scenes are in-game so you're never taken out of the action for long and every chapter of the game runs smoothly into the next. Many games will make you feel that you are only taking a small part in the action. They make you feel that you are spectator or a visitor who is just along for the ride. With Half-Life 2, Valve does their best to do away with this feeling. You become Gordon Freeman. And while the rest of those who resist the Combine look to Dr Freeman as their light in the darkness, you never feel like an over-powered demi-god. The odds that stand before you seem just as insurmountable to you and they would to anyone else. And yet, you press on fueled only by a small glimmer of hope and your sense of adventure.

Add in:
+Physics Based Puzzles
+Unique and Mysterious Story
+Stunning Visuals Provided by the Source Engine

And you've got the making of an unforgettable gaming experience. The way gaming should be. Half-Life 2.
10/10

Half-Life 2

Vor über 10 Jahren wurde es veröffentlicht und wirkt bis heute.

Story:
Da will ich nicht vorgreifen (obwohl man 10 Jahre nach release nicht mehr so viel Spoilern kann). Trotzdem ist die Story fesselnd und gerade das Half-Life eigene Story-telling intensivivert dieses Erlebnis noch.

Atmosphäre:
Die Atmosphäre ist unglaublich dicht. Ob man durch City 17 läuft und die Unterdrückung der Menschen fühlt, oder nacht durchs unheimliche Ravenholm schleicht. Man fühlt sich immer direkt im Geschehen. Und die Graphik tut dabei auch keinen Abbruch.

Graphik:
Schon klar, das Spiel ist mehr als zehn Jahre alt, was kann man da schon erwarten? Und ich für meinen Teil kann nur sagen, ich war überrascht. Bei einem solchen Zeitunterschied hätte ich einen größeren Qualitätsunterschied erwartet. Reflexionen, Explosionen, alles auf dem Level unserer Zeit. Wenn man also kein Graphik-Fetischist ist, kann man also seinen Spaß damit haben.

Fazit:
Unglaubliches Spiel. Selbst nach 10 Jahren. Ein Muss für jeden.
Das Spiel is GENIAL !!! EIN MUSS !!! Aber erst den ersten Teil durchspiel dann an den 2ten gehn. Ich hoffe Valve führt das Projekt fort.

Why this is the best game I have ever played:

-The Graphics
 This game came out in 2004, 2004! Not 2008, not 2009, 2004. Graphically at the time, it was years ahead of its time.

-The Physics
 Half-Life 2 set the bar for physics at the time, we had never seen such as interesting way to move, break, and shove materials.

-The Story
 Amazing, well-told story with plenty of memorable characters i.e. Alyx,Dog,Barnie,Dr.Kleiner,etc.

-The Gameplay
 Don't even think of comparing this to Call of Duty, it not only has the most amazing physics I have ever seen that add to the gameplay, but the gunplay is amazing, and the puzzles add for more of a challenge to the game. Not only that, but a set of uinque weapons all with their quirks.

BUY IT.

If you haven't played Half-Life 1, go do so before playing this so you can understand the story.
If you don't want to due to the graphics (You can get used to them...), play Black Mesa.
Now onto this game, the continuation of the Half-Life story.

[b]The pros:[/b]
[list]
[*] Story wise, starts as a complete mistery, learning slowly as the game progresses
[*] Gameplay shifts from the puzzle based we had in the previous game to more shootouts
[*] Puzzles are still there, and these now rely much more heavily in physics
[*] Enemies are cooler to fight and harder, making the whole journey feel rewarding
[*] Enviornment changes thru the chapters is amazing, coupled with fantastic views
[*] You get a bit of "everything" with car driving, boat driving, calm strolls on bridges, etc
[*] Less weapons than the original, yet these are sufficient and the new ones are nice
[*] You can now have teammates that shoot along side you!
[*] Complex story that is very fun to unravel
[/list]

[b]The cons:[/b]
[list]
[*] Some areas are not-so-obvious in the path you must take/what to do next
[*] Teammates always get in your way, sometimes even killing you by blocking your escape
[*] In hard, soldiers are true bullet sponges, some taking a full 45 bullets magazine to kill
[*] Auto-closing doors is profoundly wrong, looks stupid and disrupts gameplay alot
[/list]

An awesome Sci-fi/Horror FPS that greatly builds upon the Half-Life mythos. The Gravity Gun and Physics are really put on display here, and afre very fun to use. The Level design is well done, but the sound design isn't unfortuneately. Don't get me wrong, this game has a really awesome soundtrack, but the sound effects leave something to be desired. Most of this comes from the overuse of stock sound effects, I understand when a small studio resorts to stock sound effects, but it is suprising coming from Valve. Second is the gun sounds, for the most part they are fine, but the regular pistol sounds a tad pathetic, as well do the stand-alone MG turrets. The reload sound for the Shotgun sounds like someone flicking a rubber band, which is bizzare.

Overall an impressive game! This was my first time playing it, over 10 years after it was released, and it still holds up.

Ce jeu démontre tout le savoir faire de VALVe :
Savoir créer une suite encore plus réussie que leur prédécesseur.
Au programme de cette référence du FPS linéaire,
- Un scénario imposant, réaliste et riche en rebondissements, saupoudré d'un caractéristique souci du détail.
-Du gunfight avec une variété d'armes contre des ennemis encore plus divers et variés que dans le premier volume, (Zombies, Headcrabs, Soldats combines, ECT.)
- Une utilisation parfaitement réussie du moteur graphique de référence de VALVe, Le SOURCE engine, doublée d'une plutôt bonne physique.
- Une OST réussie et qui colle très bien a l'ambiance du jeu.
- Une bonne intelligence artificielle, qui vous offrira du challenge a plusieurs reprises.
- Et sa variété de mods créés par la communauté, qui vous offrira plusieurs possibilités de re-jouabilité.

Tout cet ensemble de choses offre ce FPS unique, qui est pour moi et ses nombreux fans une des références en la matière.
